ai_researched_costs.software_details: Adobe Creative Cloud Photography Plan ($19.99/month) includes Photoshop and Lightroom. Figma Professional ($15/month/user) for collaborative design. Canva Pro ($12.99/month) for social media graphics. Total estimated monthly software cost: $47.98, rounded to $48. Regional pricing for Cambodia often aligns with global rates, with occasional student discounts available. Freelancer plans for software are generally standard.
ai_researched_costs.workspace_details: Assuming a hybrid model: 5 days/month at a co-working space like Emerald Hub ($10/day for day pass) for focused work and networking opportunities. Home office costs (electricity, AC) estimated at $40/month for 20 hours/week usage in Phnom Penh. Factory Phnom Penh offers monthly plans around $100-150, but for a junior designer with 20 hrs/week, selective day passes offer more flexibility and cost-efficiency. This estimate favors a more budget-conscious approach for a junior. Shared office rentals are typically higher per month. Cafe working costs are variable but often lower than dedicated co-working.
ai_researched_costs.equipment_details: Assuming a mid-range Windows laptop suitable for graphic design (e.g., ASUS Vivobook, Lenovo IdeaPad) costing approximately $700. A Wacom Intuos tablet ($100) and a decent monitor ($200). Total equipment: $1000. Amortized over 3 years (36 months): $1000 / 36 months = ~$27.78/month. For a junior designer prioritizing cost, potentially a well-maintained used laptop could be considered. This amortized cost is allocated to the operational expenses.

ai_researched_income.income_reasoning: Based on a general cost of living estimate for a single individual in Phnom Penh, a modest but sustainable income requiring around $500/month for basic living expenses (rent for a shared room, food, transport). Junior employed graphic designers in Cambodia typically earn between $300-$500/month. Freelancers need to account for benefits, taxes, and inconsistent income, thus aiming for at least 20-30% more than employed counterparts for a basic living. This is a baseline to achieve a basic standard of living.

market_research.market_insights: Local freelance rates for junior graphic designers in Cambodia are often found in the $5-$9/hour range. Platforms like Upwork and Fiverr show Cambodian designers often starting around $5-$8/hour. Agencies may charge clients $20-$40/hour for junior designer work, but that includes overhead. For logo design, hourly rates can fluctuate, but project-based pricing is common, potentially ranging from $50-$150 for a junior. Social media graphics are often priced per package or per graphic, with juniors charging $5-$15 per graphic. The recommended rate sits within the mid to upper-mid range for a junior, reflecting growing demand for quality design.

ai_researched_costs.software_details: Adobe Creative Cloud (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) is essential for branding and print design. The Photography plan (Photoshop + Lightroom) is around $9.99/month. However, for comprehensive branding and print work, the All Apps plan is more suitable. While Adobe doesn't explicitly list regional pricing for Cambodia, standard international pricing for individuals is $54.99/month. Figma Professional is $12/editor/month, but for a single designer, the free tier is sufficient unless collaborating extensively. Canva Pro is approximately $13/month. Assuming the All Apps plan for Adobe is the primary cost, with potential supplemental use of free/lower-tier tools, a monthly estimate of $50 is a reasonable mid-point for essential software. No student discounts readily advertised for Cambodia, and freelancer programs are often tied to specific regions.
ai_researched_costs.workspace_details: A mid-level designer in Phnom Penh might opt for a co-working space for networking and a dedicated work environment. Factory Phnom Penh offers various tiers; a flexi-desk might range from $80-$150/month. Emerald Hub and SmallWorld also have similar pricing for flexi-desks. A home office requires significant electricity and AC usage. For a 30-hour work week (approx. 120 hours/month), with AC running 4-5 hours/day, electricity costs could be around $50-$100+. Shared office rentals are typically higher. Cafes are not ideal for consistent, professional work and can incur costs through purchases. $100/month is a reasonable average for a co-working space or a managed home office expense.
ai_researched_costs.equipment_details: A mid-level designer would need a capable laptop. A MacBook Air M2 (base model) is around $1000-$1200. A comparable Windows laptop (e.g., Dell XPS, HP Spectre) would be in a similar range. Essential peripherals: a good monitor (27-inch IPS ~$250), graphics tablet (Wacom Intuos ~$100), and ergonomic keyboard/mouse (~$100). Total estimated equipment cost: $1450 - $1650. Amortized over 3 years (36 months): $1550 / 36 months = ~$43.06/month. Rounded to $42.

ai_researched_income.income_reasoning: According to various sources, the average salary for an employed mid-level graphic designer in Phnom Penh can range from $500-$900 USD per month. Freelancers typically need to earn 20-30% more to account for benefits, taxes, and periods without work. Thus, a desired monthly income of $1200 USD is a realistic target for a mid-level freelancer to live comfortably and build a sustainable business, covering living expenses and reinvesting in their career.

market_research.market_insights: Local job boards and general freelance platforms show rates for graphic designers in Cambodia often ranging from $10-$20 per hour. Agencies might charge $25-$50+ per hour to clients. Branding and print design are specialized skills, allowing for rates on the higher end of this spectrum, especially for startups with a good understanding of brand value. International platforms can offer higher rates, but competition from designers in lower-cost countries is also a factor. Positioning around $15-$20/hour for mid-level work is competitive and reflects the specialization.

ai_researched_costs.software_details: Adobe Creative Cloud All Apps ($60), Figma Professional ($15), and a suite of productivity tools like Notion and Canva Pro ($20) based on current 2024 global pricing applied to Cambodia.
ai_researched_costs.workspace_details: Reflects a dedicated desk at Factory Phnom Penh or Workspace 1 (Phnom Penh). Prices range from $80 for hot desks to $150 for premium shared office environments in 2024.
ai_researched_costs.equipment_details: Calculated on a $3,500 setup (MacBook Pro M3 Max, 27-inch 4K Color-accurate monitor, and ergonomic peripherals) amortized over a 36-month lifespan.

ai_researched_income.income_reasoning: A senior designer in Phnom Penh earns $1,800-$2,200 net at top agencies. Freelance targets are set 30% higher ($2,850) to account for personal tax (PAT), health insurance, and lack of paid leave, tailored for corporate client budgets.

market_research.market_insights: The Phnom Penh market for UI/UX is maturing; local corporate clients now expect international standards. Senior rates below $25 are often viewed as 'junior' or 'low-quality' by major banks and telcos, while $40-50 is the standard for high-level specialized consulting.

ai_researched_costs.software_details: Adobe Creative Cloud All Apps ($60/mo), Figma Professional ($15/mo), Canva Pro ($13/mo), and Motion Graphics specialized plugins/Maxon One subscription ($47/mo amortized).
ai_researched_costs.workspace_details: Dedicated desk at Factory Phnom Penh or Workspace 1. Reflects current 2024 pricing for premium co-working including high-speed backup and meeting room credits.
ai_researched_costs.equipment_details: High-end setup: MacBook Pro M3 Max 64GB RAM ($4,200), Dell UltraSharp 4K Monitor ($800), and Wacom Tablet/Peripherals ($900). Total $5,900 amortized over 36 months.

ai_researched_income.income_reasoning: Based on a senior Creative Director salary in Phnom Penh ($3,000-$3,500) plus a 35% freelance premium to cover tax (20% for non-residents or high-bracket tax), insurance, and lack of employer benefits. Motion graphics and brand strategy command a premium in the corporate sector.

market_research.market_insights: Phnom Penh corporate market for Motion Graphics is niche. While general graphic design is saturated at $15-25/hr, expert brand strategy combined with high-end motion (After Effects/C4D) allows for rates matching regional hubs like Bangkok or Singapore when serving multinational clients.
